pr_title: [FLINK-15497][table-planner-blink] Reduce outputs when rank number is not required in Retractable topN

timeline.bodyText: We should emit delete/retract record first, then emit accumulate record. Otherwise, there might be some problems, e.g. user may see instantly incorrect results (top3 but see top4 at some point of time).
timeline.author: wuchong

timeline.bodyText:
Could you add some comments on this? IIUC, this is for padding the last entry because we retract a entry from the top-n.
Besides, could you improve the local field name of tmpRank? It's not easy to understand what the rank it is.
timeline.author: wuchong

timeline.message: [FLINK-15497][table-planner-blink] Reduce outputs when rank number is not required in RetractTopN
